wikipedia_page.main: Major General Richard Matthew McQueen Sykes CVO (born 1955) is a retired senior British Army officer. From 2010 to 2014 he was Group Chief Executive of Elizabeth Finn Care, a large charity providing relief from poverty in the UK.  A former British Army officer, his military career culminated as Assistant Chief of Defence Staff (Personnel) in the UK Ministry of Defence.  At the same he served as the Defence Services Secretary from 2007 to 2010 in the Royal Household. He is currently Chief Executive of the Sir Simon Milton Foundation.
